alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Chickasaw; Lafayette; Pontotoc; Union; Yalobusha (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 03 at 8:40AM CST until January 03 at 9:30AM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Lafayette County in northwestern Mississippi... Western Chickasaw County in northeastern Mississippi... Eastern Yalobusha County in northwestern Mississippi... Calhoun County in northeastern Mississippi... Southeastern Union County in northeastern Mississippi... Pontotoc County in northeastern Mississippi... * Until 930 AM CST. * At 839 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Paris to near Coffeeville, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Pontotoc, Houston, Trace State Park, Bruce, Calhoun City, Vardaman, Derma, Coffeeville, Ecru, Pittsboro, Slate Springs, Sabougla, New Harmony, Randolph, Pyland, Banner, Tula, Houlka, Paris and Sherman. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM CST for northeastern and northwestern Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM CST for northeastern and northwestern Mississippi.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Chickasaw; Lafayette; Pontotoc; Union; Yalobusha
